strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_MASTERY_DESC: As Nemesis Commando, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_GRANDMASTERY_DE: As Nemesis Commando, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_SINGLETAP_DESC: As Nemesis Commando, defeat Commando's vestige.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMMANDO_BOSSATTACK_DESC: As Nemesis Commando, kill an enemy with 10 stacks of gouge or more.
